title: AI Will Be Used to Craft Personalized Stories in ‘Space Nation’ Crypto Game
description: Backed by disaster film maker Roland Emmerich, Space Nation will build custom stories using blockchain and artificial intelligence.

title: Apple Shakes Up Open-Source AI With MGIE Image Editor
description: The new technique lets users chat in natural language with the model and produces better results than more established methods like Pix2Pix.

title: Ethereum upgrade aimed at lowering L2 TX costs eyes mainnet deployment
description:
Ethereum's Dencun upgrade, which introduces “proto-danksharding,” was successfully deployed on the Holesky testnet on Feb. 7.

Ethereum’s Dencun upgrade, introducing “proto-danksharding,” has successfully completed its final stage of testing via the Holesky testnet and is now awaiting a date for its mainnet deployment.

Data shows the Dencun upgrade was forked on Holesky at about 11:35 am UTC on Feb. 7, with Nethermind sharing the news on X shortly after. The upgrade is widely expected to drive down transaction costs on Ethereum layer-2s.

Prior to Holesky, Dencun was deployed on the Goerli and Sepolia testnets on Jan. 17 and Jan. 30, respectively.

Read more

title: Bitcoin surpasses $44.2k, a level last seen days after Bitcoin ETF approvals
description:
Bitcoin prices rose above $44,200 on Feb. 7, a price level observed shortly after spot Bitcoin ETFs gained approval last month. Specifically, Bitcoin (BTC) is up 2.5% over 24 hours as of 10:45 p.m. UTC, with a market price of $44,263.78 and a capitalization of $868 billion. This marks a nearly one-month high, as BTC […]

The post Bitcoin surpasses $44.2k, a level last seen days after Bitcoin ETF approvals appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Investors Pull $1.22 Billion Worth of Ethereum ($ETH) Off Exchanges, Indicating Strong Market Confidence
description: Ethereum investors have over the span of just three weeks moved over 500,000 tokens off of cryptocurrency exchanges, in outflows that represent around $1.22 billion and reduce the supply of ETH on trading platforms significantly. title: LBank Launches Oasys: Revolutionizing the Blockchain Gaming Industry
description: PRESS RELEASE. LBank, a leading global digital asset trading platform, proudly announces the integration of Oasys into its diverse trading portfolio. This strategic move not only enhances LBank’s offering in the blockchain gaming sector but also marks a significant milestone for Oasys, heralding a new era in the blockchain gaming revolution.
